+61412345678.coaching_sms: Hi there, Vigilant AI flagged your note for Liam's shift (Daily Living goal). ISSUE: Your note uses subjective language ('really lazy', 'trying to get out of chores'). REPLY TIP: e.g. 'Liam declined to participate in household tasks today. I offered him a choice between vacuuming and washing dishes. He chose to rest in his room. I will follow up with the BSP.' URGENT: Please also call your Team Leader before your next shift. Reply to this message with your corrected note.

+61423456789.coaching_sms: Hi there, Vigilant AI flagged your note for Olivia (current shift). ISSUE: Your note describes locking the pantry door and withholding access to a drink. These are classified as environmental restraint and withholding under NDIS Practice Standards. FIX NEEDED: Describe what de-escalation strategies you used and how Olivia was supported to regulate her emotions. REPLY TIP: e.g. "Olivia became upset at 4pm. I offered her a choice between water and juice. We used her calm-down breathing technique together. She chose to sit in the garden and settled after 10 minutes." URGENT: Please also call your Team Leader before your next shift. Reply to this message with your corrected note.

+61434567890.coaching_sms: Hi there, Vigilant AI flagged your note for Noah's shift. ISSUE: Noah refused his blood pressure medication but this was not flagged as an incident.
